trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around March 25th 2013
divs: Sighting Detailsi went to the kitchen to get a pepsi, and saw blinking outside the window over porter ranch i saw what i first thought was an airplane but realized that it was brighter and then paid attention to the flashing and there was no pattern to it, so i looked real close and saw several other lights scattered closely around the main flashing lights, the object was stationary if not moving super slowly, i saw it from my kitchen window and there was a palm tree in my eye line that the ufo slowly went behind. me and my girlfriend put on shoes to go outside and get a a better view but then it was gone. or i just couldnt find it anymore.
Summary: bright randomly flashing red and white lights in center 10 or so dimmer lights surrounding arranged like a small pox shot
